mapper.select: select a.`id`,a.`order_sn`,a.`user_id`,a.`order_status`,a.`shipping_status`,a.`pay_status`,a.`consignee`,a.`country`,a.`province`,a.`city`,a.`district`,a.`address`,a.`mobile`,a.`postscript`,a.`shipping_id`,a.`shipping_name`,a.`pay_id`,a.`pay_name`,a.`shipping_fee`,a.`actual_price`,a.`integral`,a.`integral_money`,a.`order_price`,a.`goods_price`,a.`add_time`,a.`confirm_time`,a.`pay_time`,a.`freight_price`,a.`coupon_id`,a.`parent_id`,a.`coupon_price`,a.`callback_status`,a.`shipping_no`,a.`full_cut_price`,a.`order_type`,b.nickname,b.mobile user_mobile from cs_order a,cs_user b where b.id=a.user_id and a.id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from cs_order where id in
#{id}
